mapper.select: SELECT * FROM device_dhcp WHERE site_id=#{site_id} ORDER BY device_id LIMIT 1

SELECT ipaddr, device_id FROM ( SELECT ipaddr, device_id, priority, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY ipaddr ORDER BY priority) rank FROM ( SELECT device_id, host ipaddr, 1 priority FROM device_dhcp WHERE site_id = #{site_id} UNION SELECT ifip.device_id, ifip.if_ipaddr, CASE WHEN inf.oper_stauts = 1 THEN 2 ELSE 3 END priority FROM device_dhcp dhcp, interface_info inf, interface_ip ifip WHERE dhcp.device_id = ifip.device_id AND dhcp.device_id = inf.device_id AND inf.if_number = ifip.if_number AND site_id = #{site_id} ) ip ) result WHERE rank = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO device_insight (site_id, host, ipaddr, port, version, cluster_mode, cluster_index, insert_time, update_time) VALUES ( #{site_id}, #{host}, #{ipaddr}, #{port}, #{version}, #{cluster_mode}, #{cluster_index}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE device_insight SET is_master=true WHERE host = #{host} AND site_id = #{site_id}; UPDATE device_insight SET is_master=false WHERE host != #{host} AND site_id = #{site_id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO interface_info (device_id, if_number, if_name, if_desc, if_speed, if_macaddr, if_alias, admin_stauts, oper_stauts, last_octet , last_octet_update, insert_time, update_time) VALUES ( #{device_id}, #{if_number}, #{if_name}, #{if_desc}, #{if_speed}, #{if_macaddr}, #{if_alias} , #{admin_stauts}, #{oper_stauts}, #{last_octet}, #{last_octet_update}, now(), now() )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM interface_info WHERE device_id=#{device_id} AND if_number = #{if_number}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO interface_ip (device_id, if_number, if_ipaddr, network_ip, network_mask, insert_time, update_time) VALUES ( #{device_id}, #{if_number}, #{if_ipaddr}, #{network_ip}, #{network_mask}, now(), now())
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM interface_ip WHERE device_id=#{device_id} AND if_number = #{if_number} AND if_ipaddr = #{if_ipaddr};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO interface_cam (device_id, if_number, macaddr, ipaddr, update_time) VALUES ( #{device_id}, #{if_number}, #{macaddr}, #{ipaddr}, now());
